title: Exhibition Overview: Carissa Rodriguez
hero_caption: Carissa Rodriguez. Still from The Maid, 2018. © Carissa Rodriguez. Courtesy of the artist and Karma International, Zurich/Los Angeles.
short_description: Multimedia artist Carissa Rodriguez discuss her work, The Maid, and how it explores the many conditions under which art is made, circulated, and interpreted. Please note that this program has limited capacity. Participation will be on a first-come, first-served basis.
list_description: Please note that this program has limited capacity. Participation will be on a first-come, first-served basis.
description:
Hear artist Carissa Rodriguez discuss her exhibition, The Maid, and how her work reflects on the conditions under which art is made, reproduced, and circulated.

Please note that this program has limited capacity. Participation will be on a first-come, first-served basis.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
buy_button_caption: Free with museum admission, no registration required
